title: FEAR 2 - PROJECT ORIGIN
description:
I Found this version of F.E.A.R 2 - Project Origin hiding somewhere in youtube, i don't know if the guy that had it was the creator of the whole directory of the game. 

I dl it and i tried to install it. The installation window is in russian so i changed the language to english before installed it. It took like 1 or 2 hours but i can recommend it to everybody because i use a 256 onboard graphics card on a oldie laptop and the game loaded super fast. 

No other installation i tried did this. 

Everything looks fine i also scanned it for viruses(no virus detected) so please don't be a negative guy and go ahead and try it. If you like the game buy it. :) It will save you time from wondering how to apply a patch on the game. I will update this torrent when i reach that fff elevator and inform you if it still has the glitch.
